question:
In romance novels, a strapping hero often $\(\qquad\)$ a rapier in the service of an ennobled yet submissive woman; this display of force carries the day but, despite the popularity of such books, some pundits bemoan the passive portrayal of women.
Two Answers
A. sheathes
B. brandishes
C. wields
D. promulgates
E. disseminates
F. cauterizes
